question: Which union ministry has launched an Automated Real Time Performance Smart-board?
option3: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
answer: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
explanation: Union Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MEITY) has launched an Automated Real Time Performance Smart-board for effective monitoring and measurement of the key programmes of the government such as Digital India, Aadhaar, Digital Payments etc. The aim of Smart-board is to be a single window access for Centre, State or District specific projects implemented by MeitY. It will provide real-time, dynamic analytical project monitoring for critical and high priority Programme of the ministry.
